name: Blue
description: Blue is a color meme token that represents the sentiment of this cycle's bull run and all future bull runs as we see more volume revolving around the exponential growth of the base chain ecosystem. Blue is first a meme token, but Blue also provides utility through rewards for long-term holders. Top holders of the Blue token receive weekly rewards for their investment. These rewards are a function of volume and liquidity at the time. Blueish.
